pre_caption: This video is a static scenery shot of a minimalist, modern interior. The scene features a room with white tiled floors and walls, a darker textured wainscoting, and several tall, glowing, capsule-shaped windows. There is no movement from the camera or any objects within the frame.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
